title: Old.Village.Simulator.1962-TiNYiSO
description:
-=- Proudly Presents -=-

Old Village Simulator 1962 (c) PlayWay SA

Release On   : 26 June 2013         Disk Amount/Format : 1 DVD ISO
Type of Game : Simulator            Media Protection   : Nothing

Have you ever wondered how farming looked like 50 years ago

Now you can check it out Old Village Simulator will take you back in
time to mid sixties, so syou can sit behind the wheel of vintage tractors
and harvesters

You'll also participate in many unique events to see, who's the fastest
in ploughing and seeding the field, baling straw, harvesting wheat or
mowing grass. There are even tractor races

But you have to pay attention - older machines required much more
precission and skill from their operators

Features

30 unique events

18 vintage farming machines

Open world in 60's climate

Burn/mount, install, play

Greetz: LARGEiSO and MEDIUMiSO

(C) E/dfs
" SIZE DOES NOT MATTER
